description:
It seems the administrator`s identity is a human girl. Tsuyuno dies protecting Aya and her friends, but she is brought back to life as a new administrator candidate. Tsuyuno is ordered to kill Aya so she can become an official administrator. Having lost her old memories, Tsuyuno attacks Aya with supernatural strength. "Be strong." With Tsuyuno`s last words fresh in her mind, Aya`s fight begins.
Source: Amazon
